languages.text: "Я не могу ответить. Чтобы оказаться в храме, надо отыскать его, пройдя путем святой Эрианы, Матери-паучихи, что сплела самую первую нить Кровавой паутины".
"I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider. Hers was the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу ответить. Чтобы оказаться в храме, надо отыскать его, пройдя путем святой Эрианы, Матери-паучихи, что сплела самую первую нить Кровавой паутины".

traits.locale_text: "I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider. Hers was the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web."

"I cannot answer that. In order to enter the temple, you must seek it out by walking the way of Saint Erianne, the original spinstress, whose thread was the beginning of the Bloodspun Web. This song about her will help you."

"I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne. She is the Founder of the Weave. She spun the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web. This song about her will help you find the way."

"I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne. She is the Founder of the Weave. She spun the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web. This song about her will help you find the way."

"I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider. Hers was the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web."

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas autorisée à le dire. Si vous souhaitez trouver le temple, vous devez emprunter la voie de Sainte Erianne, l'araignée matriarche. Son fil a été le tout premier tissé dans la Toile de Sang. »
languages.original_text: "I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider. Hers was the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas autorisée à le dire. Si vous souhaitez trouver le temple, vous devez emprunter la voie de Sainte Erianne, l'araignée matriarche. Son fil a été le tout premier tissé dans la Toile de Sang. »

languages.text: «No se me permite revelarlo. Si desea encontrar el templo, debe recorrer la senda de santa Erianne, la Araña Matriarca. Suyo fue el hilo que se convertiría en la Red Sanguinolenta».
languages.original_text: "I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider. Hers was the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: «No se me permite revelarlo. Si desea encontrar el templo, debe recorrer la senda de santa Erianne, la Araña Matriarca. Suyo fue el hilo que se convertiría en la Red Sanguinolenta».

languages.text: “我无权回答这个问题。如果你想找到神殿，就必须踏上蛛母族长圣埃兰妮的道路。她的道路就是织血罗网的道路。”
languages.original_text: "I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider. Hers was the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: “我无权回答这个问题。如果你想找到神殿，就必须踏上蛛母族长圣埃兰妮的道路。她的道路就是织血罗网的道路。”

languages.text: 「私はこれを言う許可がない。城を見つけたいのなら、聖エリアンヌの道を歩むがいい。彼女は女帝クモ。彼女こそ、ブラッドスパン・ウェブとなる糸だった。」
languages.original_text: "I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider. Hers was the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこれを言う許可がない。城を見つけたいのなら、聖エリアンヌの道を歩むがいい。彼女は女帝クモ。彼女こそ、ブラッドスパン・ウェブとなる糸だった。」

languages.text: "Ich darf es nicht sagen. Wenn Ihr den Tempel finden wollt, müsst Ihr den Pfad der Heiligen Erianne beschreiten, der Matriarchenspinne. Aus ihrem Faden ist das Blutgesponnene Netz erwachsen.
languages.original_text: "I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider. Hers was the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: "Ich darf es nicht sagen. Wenn Ihr den Tempel finden wollt, müsst Ihr den Pfad der Heiligen Erianne beschreiten, der Matriarchenspinne. Aus ihrem Faden ist das Blutgesponnene Netz erwachsen.

languages.text: "Bunu söylemeye iznim yok. Tapınağı bulmak istiyorsan Örümcek Kraliçe Azize Erianne'in yolundan yürümelisin. Kanipi Ağı, bizzat onun ipliğinden ortaya çıkmıştır."
languages.original_text: "I am not permitted to say. If you wish to find the temple, you must walk the path of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider. Hers was the thread that would become the Bloodspun Web."
